data.text: @Karen22912 @rick_pittman @JeanmarcBenoit Yes they are scheduling longer than their own information sheets say. Someone I know reported they are doing the special populations verbal attestation and making it clear that it hasn’t been studied in those populations.

@sarahr1979 @rick_pittman @JeanmarcBenoit Thank you, just started reading..... A LOT of embedded links.... it says right in it 21/28 days apart..... they are in contravention of their own data sheet??

@JeanmarcBenoit Are you connected with the doctors at Canada Health Alliance? 

You seem a good fit to join them.. 🙏♥️
@JeanmarcBenoit Pfizer on sex after vaccine https://t.co/HKMDaSUxxD

@JeanmarcBenoit "I have read (or it has been read to me) and I understand the ‘COVID-19 Vaccine Information Sheet’"

Got that sheet handy?
@JeanmarcBenoit @Milhouse_Van_Ho Also informing people that the manufacturers enjoy full legal protection against any damage claims.
@JeanmarcBenoit Looks like clinical trial questionnaire /consent form.  Why are people not wondering why there are no forms for the flu shot, or any other vaccine?
@JeanmarcBenoit That should be a requirement in Canada don't you think?
@joannmbell The FDA Pfizer and Moderna forms are extensive in their information re ingredients. Canadian info sheets, not so much.
@JeanmarcBenoit So are people given the SDS for all ingredients in the mRNA?  If not, then absolutely no one is giving "informed consent".
@JeanmarcBenoit This is a questionaire for consent, it does not include information about potential adverse events - So this is not "informed consent".
@JeanmarcBenoit @CountryGardener Who in their right mind would sign off on this crap.  Sure seems to be a lot of cya questions.  I guess that is why all manufacturers have been given total indemnity.

@JeanmarcBenoit @CountryGardener Today I went to get my haircut b4 the total Ontario wide lockdown in April and all the standard questions were asked about all the C19 symptoms.  I said not to all.  But I said I have been spitting blood for 3 days have herpes, HIV and rectal cancer.  They said come right in.
@JeanmarcBenoit Declaration of Helsinki 2013 comes to mind.
